data.name: PageTitle
data.value: VKL.world - community of Belarusians on the Mastodon network

data.name: About_Paragraph_1
data.value: It is the first exclusively Belarusian-language community on the Mastodon network. Mastodon is the distributed equivalent of Twitter, but without the dictatorship of Ilon Musk.

data.name: Patreon_Paragraph_Part_1
data.value:
The maintenance of VKL.world costs several hundred dollars a month, and is almost entirely covered by donations from our users.

If you want and can support VKL.world, then become a patron of the server on

data.name: Patreon_Paragraph_Part_1_3
data.value:
, we will be very grateful!

There you will also find detailed VKL.world monthly open reports about the main technical updates of the server and financial costs. Your support will allow our server and community to function and remain independent.
